abstract: Student Opinion | Do You Have a Habit of Personal Writing?
snippet: Student Opinion | Do You Have a Habit of Personal Writing?
lead_paragraph: Keeping a detailed account of one's life--whether the writing is meant for the writer's eyes only, posted on a blog for all to see, or shared with a select few--is a common practice. Do you take part in it? Do you write for an audience or just yourself? Why? Have you become more--or less--active in chronicling your life and times as you get older?

headline.main: Do You Keep a Diary or Journal?
